hanzi-su-wiki:
淋

Значения

Печальный; течь

Мнемоника

Считалось, что деревья наделены душой, и их запрещалось рубить. Что может быть печальнее священной рощи 林, залитой разбушевавшейся водой 氵?
purpleculture_pinyin:
lín
to sprinkle; to drip; to pour; to drench
посыпать; капать; заливать; мочить

lìn
to filter; to strain; to drain; gonorrhea; (TCM) strangury
фильтровать; напрягаться; осушать; гонорея; (TCM) странгурия
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 林 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
淋漓尽致 [ lín lí jìn zhì ]: lit. extreme saturation (idiom); fig. vividly and thoroughly; in great detail; without restraint; (of a performance) brilliant
淋漓 [ lín lí ]: dripping wet; pouring; saturated; (fig.) uninhibited; fluid; emotionally unrestrained; extreme
淋巴 [ lín bā ]: lymph (loanword); lymphatic
淋浴 [ lín yù ]: to take a shower; shower
淋巴结 [ lín bā jié ]: lymphatic node; lymph gland
淋病 [ lìn bìng ]: gonorrhea; Taiwan pr. [lin2 bing4]
淋溶土 [ lìn róng tǔ ]: Argosols (Chinese Soil Taxonomy)
淋球菌 [ lìn qiú jūn ]: gonococcus; Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the pathogen causing gonorrhea

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You into the woods to avoid getting drenched from the rain water. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From " water " to " lin " sound. The original meaning is watering. "Said Wen": "Drain, take water. From the water, Lin Sheng." "Jade Chapter. Ministry of Water: "Drain, pour water." Such as "Qi Min Yao Shu." "The Method of Composing Yin": "Summer author, should be drenched in cold water; author of spring and autumn, should be warm, with Ruo urn, Tang Linzhi." Tang Dynasty Bai Juyi "Guo Yuan Jia Lu Letter House": "The beginning of the wind and feast boat Breaking the leak, Yulin Ge Ge wants to pour out."

"Lin Lin" means water pouring down. "Shuowen": "One said, "Linlin, and the mountains and rivers." Such as "Selected Works. "Uncle Mei "Seven Hairs"": "It started, Hong Linlinyan, like an egret flying underneath." Again referring to the sound of rain. For example, "Sorrowful Lin Fu" by Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms: "Look in the darkness of the mysterious clouds, listen to the rain in the sky."

" Pouring " through " Lin " represents the long period of rain. Such as "Zhuangzi. "The Great Master" "Lin Rain for Ten Days." Lu Deming explained: "Lin, this is the same as the rain." It also refers to the heavy rain. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Zhao Ceyi": "You are not as good as me, I am the soil. Whenever the wind and rain, I am depressed, but return to the soil."

" Lin " is also a disease name. "Su Wen. "Liu Yuan Zheng Ji Da Lun": "Urinary yellow and red, even if it is drenched." Sun Simiao of the Tang Dynasty, "Preparation for Emergency and Qianjin Essentials." The woman's side. "Linthirst": "Treats women to become irritated by gas, causing pain when urinating, up to lower abdomen.
humanum_short_description_en: From " water " to " lin " sound. The original meaning is watering.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「林」聲。本義是澆水。《說文》：「淋，以水𣵽也。从水，林聲。」《玉篇．水部》：「淋，水澆也。」如《齊民要術．作酢法》：「夏日作者，宜冷水淋之；春秋作者，宜溫臥，以穰茹瓮，湯淋之。」唐代白居易〈過元家履信宅〉：「風蕩宴船初破漏，雨淋歌閣欲傾欹。」

　　「淋淋」表示水傾瀉而下。《說文》：「一曰淋淋，山下水皃。」如《文選．枚叔〈七發〉》：「其始起也，洪淋淋焉，若白鷺之下翔。」又指雨聲。如三國魏曹植〈愁霖賦〉：「瞻玄雲之晻晻兮，聽長空之淋淋。」

　　「淋」通「霖」，表示久雨。如《莊子．大宗師》「霖雨十日。」陸德明釋文：「霖，本又作淋。」又指大雨。如《戰國策．趙策一》：「汝不如我，我者乃土也。使我逢疾風淋雨，壞沮，乃復歸土。」

　　「淋」還是一種病名。《素問．六元正紀大論》：「小便黃赤，甚則淋。」唐代孫思邈《備急千金要方．婦人方中．淋渴》：「治婦人結氣成淋，小便引痛，上至小腹。」

Chinese: You into the woods to avoid getting drenched from the rain water.  
Meaning: drench
Story: You into the woods to avoid getting drenched from the rain water.  
Kind: both

從「 水 」，「 林 」聲。本義是澆水。《說文》：「淋，以水𣵽也。从水，林聲。」《玉篇．水部》：「淋，水澆也。」如《齊民要術．作酢法》：「夏日作者，宜冷水淋之；春秋作者，宜溫臥，以穰茹瓮，湯淋之。」唐代白居易〈過元家履信宅〉：「風蕩宴船初破漏，雨淋歌閣欲傾欹。」 「淋淋」表示水傾瀉而下。《說文》：「一曰淋淋，山下水皃。」如《文選．枚叔〈七發〉》：「其始起也，洪淋淋焉，若白鷺之下翔。」又指雨聲。如三國魏曹植〈愁霖賦〉：「瞻玄雲之晻晻兮，聽長空之淋淋。」 「 淋 」通「 霖 」，表示久雨。如《莊子．大宗師》「霖雨十日。」陸德明釋文：「霖，本又作淋。」又指大雨。如《戰國策．趙策一》：「汝不如我，我者乃土也。使我逢疾風淋雨，壞沮，乃復歸土。」 「 淋 」還是一種病名。《素問．六元正紀大論》：「小便黃赤，甚則淋。」唐代孫思邈《備急千金要方．婦人方中．淋渴》：「治婦人結氣成淋，小便引痛，上至小腹。」
From " water" to " lin" sound. The original meaning is watering. "Said Wen": "Drain, take water. From the water, Lin Sheng." "Jade Chapter. Ministry of Water: "Drain, pour water." Such as "Qi Min Yao Shu." "The Method of Composing Yin": "Summer author, should be drenched in cold water; author of spring and autumn, should be warm, with Ruo urn, Tang Linzhi." Tang Dynasty Bai Juyi "Guo Yuan Jia Lu Letter House": "The beginning of the wind and feast boat Breaking the leak, Yulin Ge Ge wants to pour out." "Lin Lin" means water pouring down. "Shuowen": "One said, "Linlin, and the mountains and rivers." Such as "Selected Works. "Uncle Mei "Seven Hairs"": "It started, Hong Linlinyan, like an egret flying underneath." Again referring to the sound of rain. For example, "Sorrowful Lin Fu" by Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms: "Look in the darkness of the mysterious clouds, listen to the rain in the sky." " Pouring" through " Lin" represents the long period of rain. Such as "Zhuangzi. "The Great Master" "Lin Rain for Ten Days." Lu Deming explained: "Lin, this is the same as the rain." It also refers to the heavy rain. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Zhao Ceyi": "You are not as good as me, I am the soil. Whenever the wind and rain, I am depressed, but return to the soil." " Lin" is also a disease name. "Su Wen. "Liu Yuan Zheng Ji Da Lun": "Urinary yellow and red, even if it is drenched." Sun Simiao of the Tang Dynasty, "Preparation for Emergency and Qianjin Essentials." The woman's side. 淋字的基本解释

淋
lín
〔淋漓〕ａ．沾湿或流滴，如“大汗淋淋”；ｂ．畅快，如“淋淋尽致。”
浇：淋浴。淋湿。日晒雨淋。

淋
lìn
　ㄌㄧㄣˋ
过滤：过淋。
一种性病，病原体是淋病球菌。病人尿道红肿溃烂，尿有浓血。通称“淋病”；亦称“白浊”。

淋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lín］
［《廣韻》力尋切，平侵，來。］
亦作“痳1”。
(1)山水奔流貌；雨下貌。
(2)用以形容水、血、汗、泪等连续下滴貌。
(3)浇。让水或其他液体自上落下。
(4)浸渍。
(5)同“霖”。久雨。
[②]［lìn］
(1)病名。患者尿道发炎，小便杂有浓血。
(2)过滤。
(3)过滤盐土的建筑。

淋字的英文翻译

◎ 淋
drench, filter, pour, strain

淋字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淋； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页629第14
【唐韻】力尋切【集韻】【韻會】犁針切【正韻】犁沈切，?音林。【說文】以水沃也。一曰淋淋，山下水貌。　又淋漓，渥貌。亦作淋離。【揚雄·羽獵賦】淋離廓落。　又池名。卽太液池。【王子年·拾遺記】昭帝元始元年，穿淋池廣千步。　又與霖通。　又【集韻】力鴆切，臨去聲。亦水沃也。　【集韻】或作?。

淋字的源字形

淋字的起名意思

：指畅快，如淋淋尽致。

Drench
Basic explanation of words
Drench
lín
[Drenching] a. Wetting or dripping, such as "profuse sweating"; b. Invigorating, such as "drenching all the way."
Pouring: shower. Get wet. Sun and rain.
Drench
lìn
ㄌ ㄧ ㄣˋ
Filtration: Over-leaching.
A type of venereal disease, the pathogen is Gonorrhoeae. The patient's urethra is swollen and ulcerated, and there is thick blood in the urine. Commonly known as "gonorrhea"; also known as "white turbidity".
Drench
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lín］
["Guangyun" strives to find cutting, flat invasion, come. ]
Also known as "痳1".
(1) The appearance of mountains and rivers rushing; appearance under rain.
(2) It is used to describe the appearance of continuous drops of water, blood, sweat, and tears.
(3) Pouring. Let water or other liquids fall from above.
(4) Impregnation.
(5) Same as "Lin". Long rain.
[②]［lìn］
(1) The name of the disease. The patient's urethra is inflamed and he has thick blood in his urine.
(2) Filter.
(3) The construction of filtering saline soil.
Drench
English translation of words
◎ shower
drench, filter, pour, strain
Drench
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　Lin; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 629 14
[Tang Yun] Seek to cut [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Plow needle cut [Zheng Yun] Plow Shen cut,? Yinlin. [Said the text] Water is also fertile. One said drenching, the appearance of mountains and rivers.　It's dripping again and looks pretty. Also used for leaching. 【Yang Xiong·Yu Li Fu】Lin Li Kuo Luo.　 Also the name of the pool. Too liquid pool. 【The Year of the Prince·Supplements】In the first year of Emperor Zhao's Yuanshi, one thousand steps across the pool.　Connect with Lin again.　[Jiyun] Forced to cut and sounded. Yishuiwo also.　【Jiyun】or make?.
Drench
Source glyph
Drench
Name meaning
: Refers to carefree, such as drenching to the full.

гл. А
1) lín намокать, промокать; увлажняться
日晒雨淋 на солнце сохнуть, под дождём мокнуть
淋像落汤鸡 промокнуть насквозь (букв. "как мокрая курица")
2) lìn капать, подтекать, просачиваться
淋下 стекать, просачиваться
гл. Б
1) lín, диал. lún
поливать, орошать, мочить
雨水淋了衣裳了 дождь сильно намочил одежду
淋上点水吧! полей-ка водичкой!
2) lìn процеживать, фильтровать
把这药用纱布淋一过 процедить это лекарство разок через марлю
II lìn сущ.
гоноррея
III lín
см. 淋钟
